text.autoconfig.NEP.option.position.@Too: Choose from left, middle or right (If overwrite position is enabled this won't do anything)
text.autoconfig.NEP.option.xPosition.@To: Set the position from the left (Only works if overwrite position is enabled)
text.autoconfig.NEP.option.yPosition.@To: Set the position from the top (Only works if overwrite position is enabled)
